title: Yet another Lulu skin idea.

embed.description: Another idea for a skin for Lulu. Still haven't thought of a name, but its supposed to be doll themed. I realize now I could have made a sewn chaos one. Might do that in the future.

body: I'm gonna be making a lot of these..cause I love her :O and i have lots of free time. I can't think of names all the time though so here you go! Lulu skin idea number 2!

replies.body:
I love this idea! It's so different from what she already has! 

Her hat is a huge read for her, so I'd suggest making that larger, and more of a focal point!  Pix is adorable! I'd love to see what her Polymorph and staff look like! 

As for a name, that's tricky! I'd put her in a new line of skins, as I don't think she fits into our existing themes, which is awesome! 

Awesome work! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=A6EEERTB,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-02-19T19:38:10.475+0000)
>
> I love this idea! It's so different from what she already has! 
> 
> Her hat is a huge read for her, so I'd suggest making that larger, and more of a focal point!  Pix is adorable! I'd love to see what her Polymorph and staff look like! 
> 
> As for a name, that's tricky! I'd put her in a new line of skins, as I don't think she fits into our existing themes, which is awesome! 
> 
> Awesome work! ^-^

Sewn Chaos?
I think it should just be simple like Porcelain Doll Lulu, and have it part of a doll set, along with Ragdoll Poppy.

What about the one that Orianna has, blade something?
Annie playing in the background makes this a real #NightmareFuel

Wow this is good
I mean your perspective is all kinds of screwy, but your colors and lines are on point
Id get it just because  it looks so creepy and  awesome.
OMG OMG OMG ^^ I WANT THIS SKIN ;o  i love the way you  made it ! just  amazing ^^ <3
THIS IS SO BEAUTIFUL!!!  I WANT IT !!  the only sad part is that it looked so nice like this , but lulu has a very big hat :(
As a Lulu main, I want this. I need this. This is really good and I would insta buy. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Please draw my emt-mo concept hahaha i'll love you forever
That's awesome! And I love the Annie with Tibbers in the background, great focus in details!!!
